sentences.cn: 特有的不连贯而且刺耳的嗓音

sentences.en: And students about the link will staccato its combination. Zhiyong.
sentences.cn: 并在学生关于断奏的联系中将其结合. 致用.

sentences.en: He shouted a series of staccato orders.
sentences.cn: 他一顿一顿地大声下了几道命令.

sentences.en: He spoke in Arabic, a short staccato burst.
sentences.cn: 他突然用阿拉伯语叽里呱啦说了一串话。

sentences.en: Her pencil tapped out a staccato rhythm on the desk top.
sentences.cn: 她用铅笔断断续续地敲击着桌面.

sentences.en: His thinking, he said, has taken on a “staccato” quality, reflecting the way he quickly scans short passages of text from many sources online.
sentences.cn: 他的思想，他说道，已经呈现出一种“断奏”的特性了，这反映为他在线上众多资源中，常常快速浏览短小文章段落的方式上。

sentences.en: It incorporated acoustic - guitar playing, singing, chanting, dancing, and staccato hand - clapping.
sentences.cn: 他集合了原声吉他弹奏, 歌唱, 吟诵, 舞蹈和间断鼓掌等多种形式为一体.

sentences.en: Legato and staccato on the harmonica.
Maybe I'm a back number. I can never enjoy a play of staccato scenes.
sentences.cn: 也许我是个落伍的人了, 我欣赏不了一出场面互不连贯的戏.

sentences.en: On the street , firecrackers were bursting like the staccato hoofbeats of stampeding horses.
sentences.cn: 外面万马奔腾似的爆竹声送进他的耳里.

sentences.en: She chews him out in a staccato of Hebrew, while he stares passively at her.
sentences.cn: 她以一种希伯来式的断音责骂着这位年轻人，而对方只能被动的瞪着她。

sentences.en: Squirrels added staccato crunch notes with their arced leaps.
sentences.cn: 松鼠蹦蹦跳跳增加了嘎吱嘎吱的断奏音符.

sentences.en: The banging on the door had reached steady staccato.
sentences.cn: “砰砰”的撞门声来得结实又沉稳,成了有节律的断奏.

sentences.en: The short lines helped me create a sort of staccato effect.
sentences.cn: 短行造句帮助我创造了一种断奏的效果.

sentences.en: The staccato chatter of a machine - gun was heard again.
sentences.cn: 卜卜卜—— 机关枪 的声音跟着又来.

sentences.en: They flutter about nervously in staccato hops.
sentences.cn: 他们焦虑不安,不断跳跃.

sentences.en: While you may not be able to hear the heartbeat through a sonogram or Doppler for a few weeks yet when you finally do the rapid staccato beats will be concrete evidence of the life inside you.
sentences.cn: 在几周内，你可能还不能够通过声波图或者多普勒超声听到婴儿的心跳，但当你最终听到时，那快速的断断续续的节奏巩固你身体里有个小生命的证据。

trans.tran_cn: 断音的；断奏的，发不连贯爆发性声音的；短促刺耳的
trans.tran_en: A staccato noise consists of a series of short, sharp, separate sounds
if music is played staccato, the notes are cut short
